description:
Dad enters the Parent/Child Ball Match Tournament on Bunji`s team. He`s casually playing around when a fast ball comes flying in. Bunji looks and sees Gonda on the opposing team! They are ready to duel to the end with their familial pride on the line. Bunji develops a bad habit where he chews on his hand while watching TV...Bunji, the "king of forgetfulness" announces he has a test tomorrow. He was able to forward a message from his teacher without forgetting it! After this, he`s ready to study hard and get a 100 on his test! Mom sees this and helps. Many of Fumi`s friends come over for her birthday party. Fumi gets upset with Kanna in a discussion about cooking. Inside of Fumi, White Fumi and Black Fumi argue...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dodgeball / Pretty Exciting / Getting Prepared / Birthday Party
ドッジボール / なんかコーフン / 予習 / お誕生会
